message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great opportunity to purchase a high-quality product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer for it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you consider that?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $140. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Can you meet me in the middle?

I'm glad you're still interested in the product, Bob! I can see you're a serious buyer. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit, so I can offer it to you for $132. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $128. Can you consider that?

I'm starting to think we're close, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I can offer it to you for $130. It's a great deal, and I think you'll love it. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not comfortable going above $125. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget. Can you meet me at $125?
